text: Ate isa tar'ham asi' larake manukham ate larake jinam nu hara ika paigabara da dusamana bana dita. Uha ika duje nu dhokha dena la'i chala kapata di'am galam sikha'unde hana. Ate jekara tera raba cahuda tam uha ajiha kara sakade si. Isa la'i unham nu chada di'o tam ki uha jhutha banhade rahina
